info.title: TibiaWikiApi
info.description: Expose data (creatures, items, quests, etc.) from TibiaWiki (https://tibia.wikia.com) with a REST API

get.summary: Get a list of streets

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: optionally expands the result to retrieve not only the street names but the full streets

401.description: not authorized to edit without providing credentials

400.description: the provided changed street is not valid

get.summary: Get a list of spells

parameters.name: expand

400.description: the provided changed spell is not valid

401.description: not authorized to edit without providing credentials

get.summary: Get a specific loot statistics page by creature name
Get a specific street by name
Get a specific spell by name
Get a specific quest by name
Get a specific wiki page by title

200.description: wiki page with specified title found

404.description: wiki page with specified title not found, or not parsable to one of the supported domain models.
